about_the_game:
Executioner Girls is a highly difficult turn-based RPG. Skilled adventurers and criminals hid in secret graveyard. Chara, the protagonist, has to complete the single mission given by exploring the graveyard as an executioner.

Character Growth

Upgrade your character by specializing in your desired status, such as physical attacks, magic attacks, and agility. Find the right weapons and equipment to fit the build.

Weapons reinforcement and item collection

Proper items are all needed for potion making, armor making, and weapon strengthening. Eliminate monsters and collect necessary items.

Powerful Enemies

Even the weakest enemy can cause fatal injury to the player. Identify the weaknesses of each enemy and target them. Even if the player dies, you can resurrect indefinitely without penalty.

Killing NPC

Kill the NPC to get powerful weapons or rare equipment, or to improve your skills, or just because you're bored. But be careful. Most of them never come back when they die!

A story that is profound and requires some speculation

The game doesn't tell you everything. Talk to the NPC to see what the purpose of 'Chara' is and what is happening.

Challenging content and New Game+

Try challenging content such as hard mode where not a single death is allowed and a magic tower with 20 floors. After the ending, you can start a NG+ to enjoy a different build than before or to further strengthen your current build.

Character Costume

Conquer the content to obtain special costumes for the protagonist and companions and dress them up to your liking. There are also options to prevent sensitive exposure.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult-only content (exposed costumes, body exposure.) However, sexual activity is not included.

name: Executioner Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting OpenGL
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
